nodes.text: Perlemia was a planet located in the Perlemia system in the Core Worlds.

Prior to 24,000 BBY, Perlemia was the site of extensive shipyards that produced numerous scoutships for the hyperspace explorers of the early Republic. Owing to this, it was the namesake of the Perlemian Trade Route.
The shipyards were destroyed by pressure bombs during the Tionese War.
